status.description: Processing status of the request (success, error, or partial completion)

code.description: Error code identifier for programmatic handling

field.description: Specific field that triggered the error

severity.description: Error severity level (critical error or advisory warning)

errors.description: List of errors encountered during processing, null if no errors

achievements.description: Quantifiable accomplishments formatted with STAR method and action verbs

strengths.description: Effective aspects of the achievements section

areas_to_improve.description: Suggestions to enhance achievements impact and relevance

feedback.description: Evaluation of achievements quality and relevance to target role

data.description: Container for optimized achievements and evaluation feedback
